title: Cafe Bahnhof
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, Italian, Salad bar, Take-out, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cozy restaurant with growing vegan choices. As of Oct 2015, vegan items are pizza with vegan cheese, vegan salads daily and several others. On the last Thursday of the month a vegan menu is available which includes desserts. Owner is knowledgeable about veganism and is open to suggestions. As of Oct 2015, the vegan dishes are not yet included in part in the card, so you should always ask what is offered currently.
